typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,contract IERC20,bytes32) returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Registers a list of tokens in a General Pool.
 This function assumes `poolId` exists and corresponds to the General specialization setting.
 Requirements:
 - `tokens` must not be registered in the Pool
 - `tokens` must not contain duplicates

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,contract IERC20) view returns (bytes32)
function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,contract IERC20) returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Deregisters a list of tokens in a General Pool.
 This function assumes `poolId` exists and corresponds to the General specialization setting.
 Requirements:
 - `tokens` must be registered in the Pool
 - `tokens` must have zero balance in the Vault
 - `tokens` must not contain duplicates

@dev Sets the balances of a General Pool's tokens to `balances`.
 WARNING: this assumes `balances` has the same length and order as the Pool's tokens.

@dev Sets `token`'s managed balance in a General Pool to `amount`.
 This function assumes `poolId` exists, corresponds to the General specialization setting, and that `token` is
 registered for that Pool.
 Returns the managed balance delta as a result of this call.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,contract IERC20) view returns (bytes32)
function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,contract IERC20,bytes32) returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Sets `token`'s balance in a General Pool to the result of the `mutation` function when called with the
 current balance and `amount`.
 This function assumes `poolId` exists, corresponds to the General specialization setting, and that `token` is
 registered for that Pool.
 Returns the managed balance delta as a result of this call.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,uint256) view returns (contract IERC20,bytes32)
function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,contract IERC20) view returns (bytes32)

documentation.text:
@dev Returns the balance of a token in a General Pool.
 This function assumes `poolId` exists and corresponds to the General specialization setting.
 Requirements:
 - `token` must be registered in the Pool

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,contract IERC20,uint256) view returns (bytes32)

documentation.text:
@dev Same as `_getGeneralPoolBalance` but using a Pool's storage pointer, which saves gas in repeated reads and
 writes.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableMap.IERC20ToBytes32Map storage pointer,contract IERC20) view returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Returns true if `token` is registered in a General Pool.
 This function assumes `poolId` exists and corresponds to the General specialization setting.
